template.name: docker-build
template.content:
@echo off rem /** rem * Copyright (c) 2013-Now http://jeesite.com All rights reserved. rem * No deletion without permission, or be held responsible to law. rem * rem * Author: ThinkGem@163.com rem */ echo. echo [信息] 打包Web工程，导入到Docker服务。 echo.
%~d0 cd %~dp0
cd .. call mvn clean package docker:stop docker:remove docker:build docker:run -Dmaven.test.skip=true -U
cd bin pause
